des:
MASTER Smart Home is a new, innovative and easy-to-use management system for your lights, switches, electric shutters, blinds and awnings. With the MASTER Smart Home skill, you can use voice commands to control your smart devices.

To use this Alexa Skill, you need a MASTER Smart Home account as well as connected MASTER Smart Home devices. To get started, download the MASTER Smart Home application from the App Store or Google Play, register your account and connect your smart devices.
For more information about MASTER Smart Home, please visit https://master-electric.gr/en/category_smarthome .

To link your MASTER Smart Home account to Alexa, open the Alexa app, go to Skills & Games, search for "MASTER Smart Home", select "MASTER Smart Home" and select "Enable". You will be redirected to a login page, where you can login and link your MASTER Smart Home account.

Bellow you will find supported voice command examples:

• To turn on or off a light or a switch, say:
"Alexa, turn on the [device name]."
"Alexa, turn off the [device name]."

• To change the brightness of your lights, say:
"Alexa, set the [light name] to 50 percent."
"Alexa, set the [light name] to full brightness."
"Alexa, dim the [light name]"

• To change the color of a light, say:
"Alexa, set the color of [light name] to blue."
"Alexa, change the bedroom light to red."

• To control your blinds or shutters, say:
"Alexa, raise the living room blinds."
"Alexa, open the bedroom shutters."
"Alexa, close the living room blinds."
"Alexa, lower the bedroom shutters."


For additional info or if you need support, contact us at info@master-electric.gr
